mapper.select: select m_no, m_id, REGEXP_REPLACE(m_name, '.', '*', 2, 1) AS m_name, REGEXP_REPLACE(m_tel, '(\\d{3})\\-(\\d{3,4})\\-(\\d{4})', '\\1-****-\\3') AS m_tel, CONCAT('***', SUBSTR(m_email, 4, LENGTH(m_email))) AS m_email, to_char(m_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as m_date, to_char(m_update, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as m_update, m_isdelete from member where m_no = #{m_no}
